select u.u_gen sex, count(u.u_num) resCount from capitalist ca join users u on ca.u_id = u.u_id join reservations r on r.capitalist_num = ca.capitalist_num
where r.res_date between #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd}
where r.res_date between add_months(sysdate,-3) and sysdate
group by u.u_gen

select n.u_gen sex, count(n.notuser_num) resCount from capitalist ca join notusers n on ca.notuser_num = n.notuser_num join reservations r on r.capitalist_num = ca.capitalist_num
where r.res_date between #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd}
where r.res_date between add_months(sysdate,-3) and sysdate
group by n.u_gen

select c.c_ci_adr local, to_char(count(r.res_num), '999,999,999') resCount from reservations r join cinemas c on r.c_num = c.c_num
where r.res_date between #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd}
where r.res_date between add_months(sysdate,-3) and sysdate
and c.c_ci_adr like '%'||#{localSea}||'%'
group by c.c_ci_adr
